Question: In the satirical cartoon show Lil' Bush, Dick Cheney's father is portrayed as being this person.
Hints: On June 22, 2006, U.S Vice President Dick Cheney referred to himself as the ____ of the Bush administration.
In this draft, he made use of a new plot twist: this person claiming to be Luke's father.
Anakin battled Kenobi on the site of a volcano and was badly wounded, but was then reborn as this person.
